long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A pomodoro study timer that is simple and easy to access. Pomo has a 25 minute study timer, 5 minute break timer, and 15 minute break timer. The Pomo icon in the top right corner will appear white when not in use (or paused), red when the timer is active, and change to green when the timer has ended. Additionally, if chrome notifications are enabled a notification banner or alert will appear notifying you that your timer has ended.
